page.title: 03A Day in a Family Life
page.content: {Our Family is Ivy,Frederick,Patricia, {17,and Peter who is 10. {6.15}Fred cleans fire,I cook breakfast and make sandwiches.{7.15}Children up. {7.35}Fred to work,The Water Authority. {8.20}Peter walks to school. {9.10}I cycle to work,as a Home Help. {9.15}Driving lesson for Tricia,school at {10.30. {12.00}Tricia comes home for lunch. {14.00 }I return,have lunch and do housework.{15.40}Tricia to her job in supermarket.Fred and Peter return home.we do weekly shopping Peter out to play.{17.00}Fred cuts hedge while I cook dinner.{20.00}Tricia comes home, has dinner,then goes out with her friends perhaps to a disco. {20.15 Peter and I visit grandparents and usually have a game of Lexicon before returning home .{20.45}Fred to pub. {22.00}Peter in Bed.We await Tricia.
